mapper.insert: INSERT INTO UserQuestion_tbl SELECT IFNULL(max(QnA_id)+1,1000000), "Company", #{uqGroupItem}, #{member_id}, #{uqUserName}, #{uqUserEmail}, #{uqUserPw}, #{uqUserPhone}, #{uqRelatedLink}, #{uqTitle}, #{uqContent}, "0", #{uqAttachFile}, NOW(), #{uqUpdateDt}, #{uqDeleteDt}, #{uqIpAddress}, "0", #{uqOption1}, #{uqOption2}, #{uqOption3}, #{uqInvoker}, #{uqInvoker_id}, #{statistics_id}, #{uqAdminNotice} FROM UserQuestion_tbl
mapper.select: select *, date_format(uqInsertDt,'%Y-%m-%d') as fmuqInsertDt from UserQuestion_tbl where QnA_id = #{QnA_id}
mapper.update: update UserQuestion_tbl set uqViewCount = iFnull(uqViewCount, 0) +1 where QnA_id = #{QnA_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from UserQuestion_tbl WHERE uqDeleteDt IS NULL
SELECT QnA_id, uqViewCount, member_id, uqGroup, uqTitle, date_format(uqInsertDt,'%Y-%m-%d') as uqInsertDt FROM UserQuestion_tbl WHERE uqDeleteDt IS NULL ORDER BY uqDeleteDt DESC Limit 5

select c.*, date_format(uqInsertDt,'%Y-%m-%d') as fmuqInsertDt from (select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, a.* from (select * from UserQuestion_tbl where uqDeleteDt IS NULL order by uqInsertDt desc) a, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R ) c where c.ROWNUM >= #{startRow} and c.ROWNUM <= #{endRow}
